"Crawford": "Thanks to your help, we should be able to get back on our feet."
"...Ah, also, I noticed you've spoken with Manon."
"My apologies for having caused you any undue worry."
"Ever since she was reinstated, Manon's been putting in a lot of hard work. I only hope she doesn't bring herself to exhaustion..."
"It would put me at ease if you checked in on her from time to time."
